title: League Replays
body: So I have a pretty big problem with the new replay system (And spectating as well, as they're basically the same format). Whenever I even watch a replay for a maximum of 60 seconds, my computer freezes, and I am forced to restart my computer. When I try to record, the FPS is smooth for ~5 seconds, then it starts hitting 5 FPS, then freezing. Is anyone aware of any solution to this? I can give my computer specs if need be.

replies.body:
Are you running Windows 10? If so, this may be caused by an incompatibility with the Windows Game Bar and its *Game DVR* feature. In this case, I'd recommend disabling the Game Bar using [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).

Let me know if this helped or if you aren't running Windows 10.
